TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Cou, title = Cou, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cou} }

S.FORM: Cou tatangahan: Cou saka pitu a binacadan kakaliman: Cou saka pitu a binacadan a Alisan nu buyu'an a kakenis muenenay nu Alisan akenis a buyu', i tebanay i talakaway a buyu' nu Taywan, izaw ku lisin nu heni tu kapahay a ci salangec tu habay 小米收穫祭典(homeyaya)a mikukay tu kakasan, atu palimulak tu talumaay nu malpacaway a lisin.與凱旋祭(mayasvi) nilaculan: Cou saka pitu a binacadan a Alisan nu buyu'an a kakenis muenenay nu Alisan akenis a buyu', i tebanay i talakaway a buyu' nu Taywan, izaw ku lisin nu heni tu kapahay a ci salangec tu habay 小米收穫祭典(homeyaya)a mikukay tu kakasan, atu palimulak tu talumaay nu malpacaway a lisin.與凱旋祭(mayasvi) (u kamu nu Hulam: ","homeyaya "與"mayasvi " mayasvi , .) 1:nilaculan atu kakanan nu Cou nu tuas anika uzip atu nupakalisuway nika uzip izaw ku ni "kalukan, miadup, mibuting atu misupet tu canacana" nu tademaw, maluk tu hapay tipus, uzupa', tali, unian kukakanan nu Cou a binacadan. sakakapah asu'ay a kakanan sakakapah tu uzip, makani miadup, nikalaan tu kyumah, ngabul, sizi a titian cunus han tu nu ayamam atu buting a titi, sapicunus tu sakapah tu nu uzip, Cou singanga tu nu aukay a henay. 2:zikuz:Cou u paylimayay nu tatama atu tatayna u tatama nu buculay ku tupel pabanuhan tu nu ayamay, u tungusay u iyung nu heni, nu zikuz nu heni, u sapisanga tu zikuz u tatama uyza u bukul tatayna u nu kupa,atu nu nitemunan ku zikuz nuheni, u kulit uyza u sumanahay, sanglacay, lumeni'ay, sumilaway a kulitan, mangaleb nu tatama silusi u sumanahay yamin a kulit. 3:Cou:matineng misanga' tu nalimaan milutlut tu bukal, hina nikaalaan tu aadupan ya bukal niza sapisanga' tu zikuz, ayaw namilutlut mipudac, minayat tya bukul, paacak, mikiskis tu banuh. 4:unisanga'an nu Cou a luma ' namakayniay a nasulitan nasakamuan atu natinengan

Coo tatangahan: Coo saka pito a binacadan kakaliman: Coo saka pito a binacadan a Alisan no boyo'an a kakenis moenenay no Alisan akenis a boyo', i tebanay i talakaway a boyo' no Taywan, izaw ko lisin no heni to kapahay a ci salangec to habay 小米收穫祭典(homeyaya)a mikokay to kakasan, ato palimolak to talomaay no malpacaway a lisin.與凱旋祭(mayasvi) nilacolan: Coo saka pito a binacadan a Alisan no boyo'an a kakenis moenenay no Alisan akenis a boyo', i tebanay i talakaway a boyo' no Taywan, izaw ko lisin no heni to kapahay a ci salangec to habay 小米收穫祭典(homeyaya)a mikokay to kakasan, ato palimolak to talomaay no malpacaway a lisin.與凱旋祭(mayasvi) (o kamo no Holam: ","homeyaya "與"mayasvi " mayasvi , .) 1:nilacolan ato kakanan no Coo no toas anika ozip ato nopakalisoway nika ozip izaw ko ni "kalokan, miadop, miboting ato misopet to canacana" no tademaw, malok to hapay tipos, ozopa', tali, onian kokakanan no Coo a binacadan. sakakapah aso'ay a kakanan sakakapah to ozip, makani miadop, nikalaan to kyomah, ngabol, sizi a titian conos han to no ayamam ato boting a titi, sapiconos to sakapah to no ozip, Coo singanga to no aokay a henay. 2:zikoz:Coo o paylimayay no tatama ato tatayna o tatama no bocolay ko topel pabanohan to no ayamay, o tongosay o iyong no heni, no zikoz no heni, o sapisanga to zikoz o tatama oyza o bokol tatayna o no kopa,ato no nitemonan ko zikoz noheni, o kolit oyza o somanahay, sanglacay, lomeni'ay, somilaway a kolitan, mangaleb no tatama silosi o somanahay yamin a kolit. 3:Coo:matineng misanga' to nalimaan milotlot to bokal, hina nikaalaan to aadopan ya bokal niza sapisanga' to zikoz, ayaw namilotlot mipodac, minayat tya bokol, paacak, mikiskis to banoh. 4:onisanga'an no Coo a loma ' namakayniay a nasolitan nasakamoan ato natinengan
